summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4646 for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest, from West Hudson Street to West Raymond Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 53999, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
